title: Powerless / Killing Gods: A Superhero Novel Double Edition
description: This is a special edition collecting the first two books in the 'Powerless' superhero novel series from Tony Cooper.****POWERLESSWhen the friend of a retired superhero is killed by another power, he drags himself out of his self-imposed isolation to find out who is responsible.He soon finds himself digging up a past he would rather forget, risking exposing the secret of why his team split up and destroying all their lives.****KILLING GODSWhen a physically mutated villain's son goes missing from protective care, he is determined to do whatever it takes to find his child and punish those responsible.In his way stand a Child Protection Officer following her heart above her duty, a violent anti-hero group desperate for media attention, a seemingly benevolent hero-worshipping cult and Martin and Hayley struggling to work out who they can trust.
author: Tony Cooper
